title: Detect whether user has rated the app or not
body: As a developer, the only way to increase app ratings and review is to prompt user.

comments.body:
I just tried the following and got an error response:
StoreSendRequestResult hasReviewed = await StoreRequestHelper.SendRequestAsync(context, 6, String.Empty);
This should be supported now -- if you use StoreRequestHelper.SendRequestAsync and pass 6 and an empty string as the parameters, you should get back a response. (Not documented yet...):
This will never be added because of risk of abuse (forcing users to rate before continue).
I would be worried this would be misused to force people to rate the app, just so they can continue to use it.
Hey dev, you know that any time an app begs for ratings, a lot of us make sure to rate it one star, right?
It would be really nice to have it...
why not.. though one at a time.. I rather focus on getting WPDev to agree first :)
Are you going to post this to the Win 8 User Voice as well?
